alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 5:13PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 600 PM MST... At 513 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Maricopa, or 11 miles west of Sun Lakes, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Bapchule, Estrella Sailport, Firebird Lake, Ak-Chin Village and Santan. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 163 and 175. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 157 and 162. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 35 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; West Pinal County
